Html:
Is there a JavaScript function which will allow me to programatically insert text into the RTE?

For example, using the onclick attribute of an anchor tag, I would like to call a JavaScript function to programatically insert some text.

Thanks for your ideas.

Never mind.  I answered my own question.

Here is the code to programmatically INSERT text into the RTE

function

 

insertMe(cntrl)

 

{

richeditor.Focus();

 

var selCurrent = richeditor.GetDocument().selection.createRange();

 

selCurrent.type = richeditor.GetDocument().selection.type;

 

var replaceWith = document.getElementById(cntrl).innerText;

 

selCurrent.text = document.getElementById(cntrl).innerText;

CopyText();

}
I'm trying to find an equivalent of this for firefox and having a bit of trouble. Can someone help?
